title: Drawing, 20th century
medium: Pastel, graphite on white wove paper mounted on brown wove paper
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Abstract all-over chevron design, with repeating diagonally-placed trapezoidal shapes, filling the space between the v's of the chevrons, in the upper right corner.  The design is in green and blue with the brightest colors in the upper right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, 20th century.
20th century. Pastel, graphite on white wove paper mounted on brown wove paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-64.
